name: Last Two Braincells
description:
Join forces with a friend and take control of the last two brain cells of a party-goer. Your mission: keep the party alive by satisfying the brain's cravings. Complete mini-games and compete for the highest score.
Can you keep the party going all night long?

Controls

ActionX-Box Controller
MoveLeft Stick
DashRight Trigger
Grab items
Left Trigger
MinigamesLeft Stick // A or X
